title: fried rice
description: Lightly steaming the fish allows all the flavours to shine in this easy Chinese fried rice recipe.Each serving provides 253kcal, 25g protein, 2g carbohydrate (of which 1.5g sugars), 16g fat (of which 3.5g saturates), 0.1g fibre and 3.9g salt.
ingredients: 4 thick white fish fillets with skin, such as cod, or coley, weighing about 115g/4oz each
thumb-sized piece of fresh ginger, finely shredded
2 spring onions, halved through the middle and finely shredded
small handful fresh basil leaves, shredded
enough long grain rice to fill a glass measuring jug to 400ml/14fl oz, steamed and cooled completely
Â¼ tsp freshly ground black pepper
